sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>sys_number for transfer order and transfer order line are missing in older instances where Asset Management plugin was activated prior to the existence of these sys_number definitions. </description>
        <name>Fix table transfer order/order line</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[populateTransOrderNumEntry();
populateTransOrderLineNumEntry();

function populateTransOrderNumEntry(){
	var sysNumberGr = new GlideRecord('sys_number');
	sysNumberGr.addQuery('category', 'alm_transfer_order');
	sysNumberGr.query();
	
	if(!sysNumberGr.next()) {
		sysNumberGr.initialize();
		sysNumberGr.category = 'alm_transfer_order';
		sysNumberGr.maximum_digits = '7';
		sysNumberGr.number = '10000';
		sysNumberGr.prefix = 'TO';
		sysNumberGr.insert();
	}
}

function populateTransOrderLineNumEntry(){
	var sysNumberGr = new GlideRecord('sys_number');
	sysNumberGr.addQuery('category', 'alm_transfer_order_line');
	sysNumberGr.query();
	
	if(!sysNumberGr.next()) {
		sysNumberGr.initialize();
		sysNumberGr.category = 'alm_transfer_order_line';
		sysNumberGr.maximum_digits = '7';
		sysNumberGr.number = '10000';
		sysNumberGr.prefix = 'TOL';
		sysNumberGr.insert();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-08-18 19:52:43</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8c35980a6711220023c187cb5685efe0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Fix table transfer order/order line</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Asset Management" source="com.snc.asset_management">3e467ca03cb1311068bcf327dfe37f49</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_8c35980a6711220023c187cb5685efe0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-08-18 19:52:43</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
